OOC: i assume you mean Sideswipe Soulstice

:::Ratchet/Sideswipe:::

::Ratchet gets hit by one of the shots.  He feels fine at first, but then 
feels a pain in his legs. they ahve been immobilized by the shots. Now he 
cannot dodge anything::
Ratchet: SLAG!
::He can still move his arms, though, so he fires 15 shots from each gun and 
2 tusk missles at Speedbreaker::
~~~~~
::Sideswipe transforms to car mode and escapes Beastbox's attack, but he gest 
hit by Squawtalk's shots. he fires 1 missle at Beastbox and 1 at Squawktalk::

--part1_13.119d094f.27c2055d_boundary
